function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of job site hygiene","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing at the job site","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through construction sites due to lack of adherence to guidelines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness about best practices in dealing with the pandemic in the construction industry","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on external organizations for the development of best practices and guidelines","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of personal hygiene practices on jobsite","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures on jobsite","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of management of sick employees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stacking of workforce trades","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclean surfaces of service and fleet vehicles","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Companies not implementing or updating policies to follow cdc, osha, and local guidelines","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to screen calls for possible exposures and circumstances before worker entry","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sick leave policies may not be flexible and consistent with public health guidance, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of communication with firms that provide contract or temporary workers about the importance of sick employees staying home, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider the concerns of workers related to pay, leave, safety, and health, leading to lower compliance with health and safety guidelines and increased risk of contagion.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information provided to workers and customers about medical care in the event of a covid-19 outbreak, leading to potential confusion and lack of preparedness.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tasks with high exposure risk to covid-19 may not be properly identified and managed, leading to potential exposure and spread of the disease among construction workers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of plans to deal with covid-19 in construction jobsites","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 prevention measures on construction sites","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forceful stop-work orders impacting construction projects","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of covid-19 transmission in construction sites due to close proximity of workers and shared workspaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to construction projects due to covid-19 prevention measures and delays.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and legal challenges for construction entities due to prolonged disruptions and stricter prevention measures.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with safety steps, job-site hygiene, social distancing, and personal protective equipment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to cdc, osha, and state regulations and guidelines","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide adequate site-specific safety plans","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workforce concerns about working in close proximity at the end of projects due to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced workforce and site-supervision workers leading to increased risk of infections","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic difficulties caused by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New generation generation c emerging due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the application of sick leave policies for construction workers, especially those paid on a daily basis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of construction workers from the formal economy from sick leave benefits, leading to vulnerability during disease outbreaks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased disease transmission due to shared housing arrangements for construction workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Workers being in close proximity to each other","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding open hotels","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of control over hotel cleanliness standards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Work suspensions, shut downs, or slowdowns due to covid-19 measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of on-site operations and increase in offsite construction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contracting at significantly lower margins and lack of in-depth investigation into bidding decisions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of parking around job sites in urban areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in demand for healthcare facilities due to pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to coronavirus on construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased demand for construction projects due to unemployment and low growth","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Project delays due to pandemic and government-mandated closures, delays in shipments of materials and equipment, challenges finding workers, and smaller work crews due to social distancing requirements.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longer project completion times due to safety changes, reduced on-site workforce, and time constraints for new construction projects.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of isolation and loneliness due to remote work and telecommuting practices","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise of new technologies for real-time tracking of employee health and covid-19 symptoms","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of remote management applications and technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
